paper.title: A decision theory approach to optimal automatic indexing
paper.venue: International ACM SIGIR Conference on Research and Development in Information Retrieval
paper.abstract: A decision theory approach to the development of retrieval systems is presented. Within this framework, optimalindexing is defined. Both the searching and the indexing problem turn out to have a common structure which is described using the concept of a u0027recognition problemu0027. A knowledge based approach to an approximately optimalindexing, strictly related to the information need of user is outlined. The theory and the used approximation methods are illustrated by a brief description of WAI/AIR projects and some of their results.
